name: FLIGHTYYY
description:
Your health is represented by the growth-State of your plane.

Collect Heal Packs to grow your plane.

Gameplay

Move the Plane with W, A, S, D

Shoot at the enemys with left click

Credits

This Game was made by Vincent John / YT: VBJ Gamedev

It was made within 48 hours for the Kenny Gamejam 2022

Assets used: Pixel Shmup  &  Pixel UI pack by Kenny
